ioControl.title: io control
ioControl.description: This xml-file contains the paths and the names of all files which are used by MAGIX

experimental_data.description: path and name of the experimental file

parameter_file.description: path and name of the xml-file including the start values of each parameter

fit_control.description: path and name of the xml file controlling the fitting process

fit_log.description: path and name of log file describing the fitting process

model_description.description: path and name of the xml-description of the input/output file of the fit function module
